item.title: Creating Our First Program In C#| C# Tutorials #2
item.description: Before creating our first program we will create a project. Step 1: Open Visual Studio. Step 2: Click on "Create New Project" Step 3: Select Language C#. Choose a platform(Our OS). Step 4: The project type will be 'console' Our first program is printing of "HelloWorld" Code:- 1 2using System; 3using System.Collections.Generic; 4using System.Linq; 5using System.Text; 6using System.Threading.Tasks; 7 8 9 10namespace ConsoleApp1 // The namespace is like a container it stores Classes and methods// 11 12{ 13 class Program 14 15 { 16 static void Main(string[] args) 17 18 { 19 Console.
